EmailTemplate.subject: [VIDEO] How to Boost Your eCommerce Strategy
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Food retailing in today’s world means offering a great customer experience - whether in-store or online. What does that mean for the e-commerce solution you might’ve rushed to adopt during the pandemic? It may be time to re-evaluate that e-commerce solution and determine the best ways to drive major revenue while satisfying your customers. In the following webinar replay, learn about the shopper insights changing the grocery technology landscape forever, including: - How to drive major sales through an airtight online merchandising strategy - The importance of marketing through your e-commerce platform (and how to do it well) - The essential things to look for in a scalable, future-flexible e-commerce solution ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Contact us to learn more. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/contact-us]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
